App.LicenseClient

Class Base

  • java.lang.Object
    • App.LicenseClient.Base
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActKey, Apple, CheckFlagStat, MainRunner, RequestLic, Verifications

    class Base
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class This class contains all the reusable methods which can come handy in many classes for easy code flow, and hence this class will be extended to most classes as parent class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Base() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected static void activationPrompt()
      activationPrompt method helps with triggering the StartAct main method (trigger for starting activation when key and digital signed file is received at user end after requesting is once done and file are avilable This prompt of Decision making is thrown only to user screen for inputs when the files required for activation is ready at host side (signed file, Activation Key) and should stop prompting once the activation is made by user successfully.
      (package private) static boolean checkIfFileExists(java.lang.String fileName)
      checkIfFileExists Method call helps in checking if a specific file is available in a given path
      protected static boolean flaggerValueForActivation() 
      protected static void infoBox(java.lang.String infoMessage, java.lang.String titleBar)
      infoBox Method to show information box as a pop up window or alert window about current flow state
      protected static java.util.Properties loadPropertyFile(java.lang.String fileName) 
      protected static void makeFlaggerActValueFalse() 
      protected static void makeflaggerActValueTrue() 
      private static java.lang.String readFile(java.lang.String fileName) 
      protected static void requestPrompt()
      Request Prompt method helps with triggering the Request Action main method within the flow depending upon file existence on specific path ie; This method checks if file which is generated on request is already present in specific location or not if available its skipping the request action (meaning this is already requested once by user) else not available that means user has never requested for licensing and hence prompting user with a Decision question to weather you need to request or not until at least once requested.
      protected static int yesNoBox(java.lang.String infoMessage, java.lang.String titleBar)
      yesNoBox Method to show a Alert or input window thrown on to the user for collecting user input about deciding which flow to take further depending upon user input

      • requestPrompt

        protected static void requestPrompt()
        Request Prompt method helps with triggering the Request Action main method within the flow depending upon file existence on specific path ie; This method checks if file which is generated on request is already present in specific location or not if available its skipping the request action (meaning this is already requested once by user) else not available that means user has never requested for licensing and hence prompting user with a Decision question to weather you need to request or not until at least once requested.

      • activationPrompt

        protected static void activationPrompt()
        activationPrompt method helps with triggering the StartAct main method (trigger for starting activation when key and digital signed file is received at user end after requesting is once done and file are avilable This prompt of Decision making is thrown only to user screen for inputs when the files required for activation is ready at host side (signed file, Activation Key) and should stop prompting once the activation is made by user successfully.

      • checkIfFileExists

        static boolean checkIfFileExists(java.lang.String fileName)
        checkIfFileExists Method call helps in checking if a specific file is available in a given path
        Parameters:
        fileName - any file to check the existence of the file
        Returns:
        yes or no
